sources.title: Alice Loses Out (1925)
sources.description: A rich garbage magnate Ima Hawg is being driven by his chauffeur to a hotel run by Alice and her cat Julius. The hotel has seen better times, and so the two are thrilled when they see the limousine roll up. Hawg demands a barber and a manicurist, and Julius feels he's up to the job. He does his best to please the grouch, with mixed results. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/alice-loses-out-1925/

metadata.Plot: A rich garbage magnate (Ima Hogg) is being driven along to a hotel, run by Alice and her cat Julius. The hotel has seen better times, and so the two are thrilled when they see the limousine roll up. Hogg demands a barber and a manicurist, and Julius feels he's up to the job. He does his best to please the grouch, with mixed results.
